WhyChooseUs.OrganicProductsTitle: Healthy Food is The Key to Your Good Mood
WhyChooseUs.OrganicProductsContent1: Our organic products are carefully selected from certified farms across Africa. Each product undergoes rigorous quality testing to ensure you receive only the finest African produce.
WhyChooseUs.ExpressGlobalDeliveryContent1: We provide express shipping options with real-time tracking to ensure your African products reach you fresh and on time, no matter where you are in the world.
WhyChooseUs.SatisfactionGuaranteeContent1: We stand behind every product we sell. Our commitment to excellence means you can shop with confidence, knowing we'll make things right if you're not completely satisfied.

ExcellenceSection.Card5Description: Customs clearance, documentation, and international market access consulting.

About.AboutDescription: Discover our journey, mission, and vision as we bridge traditional African industries with modern digital commerce

OurStory.OurStoryDescription: EFG Afro Market Company is a dynamic digital gateway under the EFG Group (Enterprise of the Future Generation), created to bring Africa's communities, natural resources, and products into the international market.

OurPurpose.OurPurposeDescription: Driving sustainable economic transformation across Africa
OurPurpose.OurMissionDescription: To digitally empower African producers, simplify global trade, and create sustainable economic opportunities by offering an end-to-end platform for international buyers and development partners.
OurPurpose.OurVisionDescription: To become Africa's leading export-oriented digital marketplace and logistics platform, showcasing the continent's rich resources while driving inclusive economic transformation.

OurFoundation.OurFoundationDescription: The principles that guide everything we do
OurFoundation.AuthenticityDescription: We ensure all products are genuinely African, preserving the authentic heritage and quality that makes them special.
OurFoundation.SustainabilityDescription: Environmental responsibility and sustainable practices are at the core of our operations and partnerships.
OurFoundation.IntegrityDescription: Transparent, honest dealings with all stakeholders, building trust through consistent and ethical business practices.
OurFoundation.InnovationDescription: Leveraging cutting-edge technology to revolutionize traditional African trade and commerce.
OurFoundation.CommunityDescription: Empowering local communities and fostering inclusive growth across the African continent.
OurFoundation.ExcellenceDescription: Commitment to delivering the highest quality products and services that exceed global standards.
OurFoundation.CollaborationDescription: Building strong partnerships and working together to achieve common goals for African development.
OurFoundation.PassionDescription: Driven by genuine love for Africa and dedication to showcasing its beauty and potential to the world.

WhyChoose.WhyChooseDescription: We're not just another marketplace. We're a comprehensive ecosystem designed specifically for African trade, combining traditional values with modern technology.
WhyChoose.TechnologyDescription: Our platform leverages AI, blockchain, and IoT technologies to provide real-time tracking and secure transactions.
WhyChoose.LogisticsDescription: From farm to doorstep, our logistics ensure fast and safe global delivery.
WhyChoose.SupportDescription: Our multilingual team provides 24/7 assistance worldwide.

ExploreProducts.ExploreProductsDescription: Whether you're an African producer looking to reach global markets or an international buyer seeking authentic African products, we're here to help.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most frequently asked questions

items.question: How can I find reliable African suppliers on your platform?
items.answer: Our platform features a comprehensive verification system for all suppliers. You can browse through verified suppliers, read reviews from other buyers, and check certifications. We also provide detailed supplier profiles with product catalogs and company information.

items.question: What types of African products are available on your platform?
items.answer: We offer a wide range of authentic African products including agricultural produce (coffee, cocoa, fruits, spices), natural resources, handcrafted items, textiles, and artisanal products. All products undergo quality verification and sustainable sourcing practices.

items.question: Do you provide assistance with logistics and shipping?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive logistics solutions including warehousing, packaging, shipping coordination, and customs clearance assistance. Our network of partners ensures your products reach you efficiently and safely.

items.question: What are your fees and commission rates?
items.answer: Our fee structure is transparent and competitive. Rates vary based on product category, volume, and services required. We offer volume discounts for regular buyers. Contact us for a customized quote based on your specific needs.

items.question: How do you ensure product quality and authenticity?
items.answer: We have a rigorous quality assurance process including supplier verification, product sampling, third-party testing, and certification requirements. Our team conducts regular audits and maintains strict quality standards throughout the supply chain.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We support multiple payment methods including bank transfers, letters of credit, trade finance solutions, and digital payment platforms. Our secure payment system ensures safe transactions for all buyers.
